home.title: Esme Accounts
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Esme Account

esmeAccount.created: A new Esme Account is created with identifier {{ param }}
esmeAccount.updated: A Esme Account is updated with identifier {{ param }}
esmeAccount.deleted: A Esme Account is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Esme Account {{ id }}?

esmeAccount.name: Name

help.name: name of this ESME account
help.isEnable: true if this ESME should be start automatically
help.isPersist: true if this ESME should be start automatically on start up
help.numBinds: number of active binds on start up
help.systemID: SystemID used to connect to remote SMSC
help.bindType: Bind Type, transmitter, receiver or transceiver
help.moErrorRate: Error Ratio for Receiving Mobile Orignated SMS
help.moErrorCode: Error Code return to SMSC for Mobile Originated SMS
help.dlrErrorRate: Error Ratio for Receiving Mobile Orignated SMS
help.dlrErrorCode: Error Code return to SMSC for Mobile Originated SMS
help.windowSize: Number of packets send out per one go
help.systemType: The system_type parameter is used to categorize the type of ESME that is binding to the SMSC
help.reconnectDelay: Delay in seconds before retry reconnect
